metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2372 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The rds_ib_xmit function in net/rds/ib_send.c in the Reliable DatagramSockets (RDS) protocol implementation in the Linux kernel 3.7.4 and earlierallows local users to cause a denial of service (BUG_ON and kernel panic)by establishing an RDS connection with the source IP address equal to theIPoIB interface's own IP address, as demonstrated by rds-ping.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2372` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
